import React from "react"; import { Card, Col, Row } from "react-bootstrap"; import { useTranslation } from "react-i18next"; const ItemList = ({ itemsData }) => { const { t } = useTranslation(); return ( {itemsData && itemsData.length >= 1 ? ( itemsData.map((item) => ( )) ) : ( )}
{item.title}
{t("all")}
{t("Breakfast")}
{t("Lunch")}
{t("Dinner")}
{item.description}
{t("text")}
{t("text2")}
{t("text3")}
{item.price}
{t("price")}
لا يوجد اصناف
); }; export default ItemList;
